name: My Little Restaurant
summary: In My Little Restaurant you seat your guests, collect orders, deliver meals and earn money. Every once in a while jump into kitchen and prepare some tastylicious burgers or perfect sushi. Touching, tapping and sliding fun, all with one finger and all for the whole family. Thirty-nine unique levels, extra game features, power-ups and a love story to follow. You won’t find a better deal at any other place.
